name: i18n-core

scripts.test: if-env CODECLIMATE_REPO_TOKEN && npm run cov:code-climate || npm run test:simple
scripts.test:simple: if-env CI=true && npm run test:unit || npm run test:dev
scripts.test:dev: npm run lint && npm run cov:dev
scripts.cov: if-env CODECLIMATE_REPO_TOKEN && npm run cov:code-climate || npm run cov:dev

scripts.cov: if-env CODECLIMATE_REPO_TOKEN && npm run cov:code-climate || npm run cov:dev

scripts.test:dev: npm run lint && npm run cov:dev
